response.overview: KNOCKOUTS. Los Angeles at night frequented by people of every race, colour and creed, and among them the twilight girls using every trick in the book to hustle the unsuspecting males who are their prey. See the beautiful young girls parading their wares and drawing the suckers into their trap. When the tables are turned see the violent action of an enraged customer and the subsequent reaction of the girls themselves to their wounded colleague. The exploitation of this lucrative racket is taken to such extremes that at last the police are forced to act to bring it to an end. A good, fast moving thriller, beautiful girls and plenty of good action to cater for every taste.
response.title: Knockouts
